changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Attention certaine commande sont supprim: Attention certain commands are deleted and others are added, following the update it is ABSOLUTELY necessary to check your scenarios and other which uses commands from the plugin
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur la repetition: Fixed an issue with repetition of commands
changelog.md.Merci @Caelion pour toute les améliorati: Thank you @Caelion for all of the following improvements
changelog.md.qui dit si une communication est en cour: that says if a call is in progress with Jeedom (TTS
changelog.md.qui donne des détails lorsqu'une applica: which gives details when a Cast application on the device (Name + Detail
changelog.md.Cette mise à jour ne laisse plus le choi: This update leaves no choice in the TTS engine
changelog.md.Ajout d'un systeme qui tue automatiqueme: Addition of a system which automatically kills the plugin processes which have been running for more than 10min

index.md.Le plugin Gcast permet d'établir un lien: The Gcast plugin makes it possible to establish a link between your Google Assistant and Jeedom
index.md.Il sera possible d'utiliser votre Google: It will be possible to use your Google Home / Google Mini to do TTS or interact with Jeedom via interactions
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin il vous f: After downloading the plugin you must activate it and enter the IP of your Google Assistant
index.md.Ce plugin permet de faire parler un goog: This plugin allows to speak a google cast and to control its volume
index.md.Il permet aussi d'agir comme un pont pou: It also acts as a bridge for interactions and Google Home
index.md.Sans IFTTT, votre Google Assistant ne po: Without IFTTT, your Google Assistant will not be able to exchange with Jeedom
index.md.Voici les quelques étapes de configurati: Here are the few configuration steps
index.md.Clic sur \"+This\", choisir Google Assis: Click on "+ This", choose Google Assistant (link your Google Assistant to IFTTT if not already done)
index.md.Choisir le trigger \"Say a phrase with a: Choose the trigger "Say a phrase with a text ingredient
index.md.Exemple de configuration de la première: Example of configuration of the first part of the Applet
index.md.What do you want to say: What do you want to say
index.md.Il faut absolument mettre '\\$' à la fin: You must absolutely put '\ $' at the end of your sentence
index.md.What's another way to say it: What's another way to say it
index.md.What do you want the Assistant to say in: What do you want the Assistant to say in response
index.md.Ici il s'agit de la phrase que votre Goo: Here it is the sentence that your Google Assistant will answer
index.md.Clic sur \"+That\", choisir Webhooks (ac: Click on "+ That", choose Webhooks (activate the service if it is not already done)
index.md.Exemple de configuration de la deuxième: Example of configuration of the second part of the Applet
index.md.Vous devez coller l'url de retour indiqu: You must paste the return url indicated on your equipment page
index.md.doit être remplacer par l'ID de votre Go: must be replaced by the ID of your Google Assistant (Click on "Advanced configuration" on the page of your equipment to know the ID) and
index.md.Il ne reste plus qu'a cliquer sur \"Save: All you have to do is click on "Save" and take advantage of your interactions between Google Assistant and Jeedom
index.md.L'utilisation de ASK est même possible: The use of ASK is even possible
index.md.Le control du volume marche mais pas le: The volume control works but not the TTS
index.md.Il faut verifier votre configuration rés: You must check your internal network configuration (the plugin uses it for TTS generation), in particular no https on the internal networks
